content.question: In the second sentence of the passage (“Ancient...history”), the series of short, simple clauses and the word play on “history” convey the author’s sense that the claims of flat-world proponents

choices.label: sound a little too superficial to be true
are supported by multiple sources of historical evidence
sound exaggerated only to those who are ignorant of historical events
seem more modest than the claims made by their opponents

content.answer: sound a little too superficial to be true
